org.gvsig.gpe.parser
Class GPEErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.gvsig.gpe.parser.GPEErrorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGPEErrorHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
GPEErrorHandlerTest
public abstract class GPEErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGPEErrorHandler

This class is a common implementation for all the application error handlers.

Author:
Jorge Piera LLodrá (jorge.piera@iver.es), Carlos Sánchez Periñán (sanchez_carper@gva.es)
